summary: This document is a sworn statement by forensic accountant Preston M. Faro, detailing his credentials and the scope of his independent review of a Financial Condition Report for Ghislaine Maxwell covering 2015-2020. Faro was hired by the law firm Cohen & Gresser LLP to verify the accuracy of the report prepared by Macalvins Accountants. He concludes the report is a complete and accurate summary of Maxwell's assets and those held in trust for her benefit during that period.

keyFacts: Preston M. Faro, a former IRS Special Agent and Certified Fraud Examiner, was hired by the law firm Cohen & Gresser LLP to independently verify a Financial Condition Report for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The report, prepared by Macalvins Accountants, summarized Maxwell's assets, assets held with her husband, and assets held in trust for her benefit from 2015 to 2020.
Faro was given complete access to all underlying documents and the accountants to conduct his verification.
Faro concluded the Financial Condition Report was a 'complete and accurate summary' of the relevant assets for the stated period.
This document appears to be an expert statement likely submitted in a legal proceeding related to Ghislaine Maxwell's finances.
